name: Prace
description:
Your objective is to save your station from asteroids. Dock to the station to recharge the ammo pool.

Controls
> Movement - WASD
> Fire - left click

Credits
> Art - Kenney
> Color Scheme - ScoreSpace

This is just a prototype of a concept I came up with!
I made it in just 24 hours so it is nowhere close to being polished.
